mapper.sql: STWD_ID, STWD_LNM, STWD_PNM, ENG_MEAN, RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, DMN_YN, DMN_LNM, SYMN_LNM, FBDN_LNM,DB_NM, OWNR_ORG, SPCL_NT
mapper.select: SELECT A.* ,(SELECT USER_NM FROM WAA_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID and EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d')) AS FRS_RQST_USER_NM ,(SELECT USER_NM FROM WAA_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.RQST_USER_ID and EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d')) AS RQST_USER_NM ,(SELECT USER_NM FROM WAA_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.APRV_USER_ID and EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d')) AS APRV_USER_NM FROM WAM_DB_STWD A WHERE A.STWD_ID = #{stwdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')

SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*, (SELECT USER_NM FROM WAA_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID and EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d')) AS FRS_RQST_USER_NM, (SELECT USER_NM FROM WAA_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.RQST_USER_ID and EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d')) AS RQST_USER_NM, (SELECT USER_NM FROM WAA_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.APRV_USER_ID and EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d')) AS APRV_USER_NM , CASE WHEN A.ERR_CHK IS NOT null AND A.ERR_CHK != '' THEN '#FF0000' ELSE NULL END AS FontColor FROM WAM_DB_STWD A WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.VALID_YN ='Y'
AND (A.VALID_YN IS NULL OR A.VALID_YN = '' OR A.VALID_YN = 'N')
AND A.VALID_YN ='E'
AND A.CONFIRM_YN ='Y'
AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
AND A.ORG_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orgNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND REPLACE(A.DB_NM, ' ', '') LIKE CONCAT('%',REPLACE(#{dbNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ' ', ''),'%')
AND REPLACE(A.DB_NM, ' ', '') IN (SELECT REPLACE(DB_NM, ' ', '') AS DB_NM FROM WAA_USER_DB WHERE USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND A.ORG_NM IN (SELECT ORG_NM FROM WAA_ORG WHERE ORG_CD IN (SELECT ORG_CD FROM WAA_USER_ORG WHERE USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}))
AND (A.STWD_LNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%') OR A.STWD_PNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%') OR A.STWD_LNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , UPPER(#{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , '%') OR A.STWD_PNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , UPPER(#{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , '%'))
ORDER BY RQST_DTM ASC,STWD_LNM ASC ) FSQ -- 임시 Alias WHERE 1=1 AND ROWNUM BETWEEN #{startNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND #{endNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC}

SELECT 1 AS NO ,'SDITM' AS BIZ_DTL_CD ,S.SDITM_ID AS STWD_ID ,S.SDITM_LNM AS STND_NM ,S.SDITM_LNM AS STWD_LNM ,S.SDITM_PNM AS STWD_PNM ,S.OBJ_DESCN ,S.RQST_USER_ID ,U.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM ,D.DATA_TYPE ,D.DATA_LEN ,D.DATA_SCAL ,D.DMN_LNM ,D.DMN_PNM FROM WAM_DB_SDITM S LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON S.RQST_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND U.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_DB_DMN D ON S.DMN_ID = D.DMN_ID AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
AND S.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
AND (S.SDITM_LNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%') OR S.SDITM_PNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%') OR S.SDITM_LNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , UPPER(#{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , '%') OR S.SDITM_PNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , UPPER(#{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , '%'))
AND S.OBJ_DESCN LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%')
AND 'SDITM' = #{bizDtlCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
UNION ALL SELECT 2 AS NO ,'DMN' AS BIZ_DTL_CD ,D.DMN_ID AS STWD_ID ,D.DMN_LNM AS STND_NM ,D.DMN_LNM AS STWD_LNM ,D.DMN_PNM AS STWD_PNM ,D.OBJ_DESCN ,D.RQST_USER_ID ,U.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM ,D.DATA_TYPE ,D.DATA_LEN ,D.DATA_SCAL ,D.DMN_LNM ,D.DMN_PNM FROM WAM_DB_DMN D LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON D.RQST_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND U.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d')
AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
AND (D.DMN_LNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%') OR D.DMN_PNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%') OR D.DMN_LNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , UPPER(#{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , '%') OR D.DMN_PNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , UPPER(#{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , '%'))
AND D.OBJ_DESCN LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%')
AND 'DMN' = #{bizDtlCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
UNION ALL SELECT 3 AS NO ,'STWD' AS BIZ_DTL_CD ,A.STWD_ID AS STWD_ID ,A.STWD_LNM AS STND_NM ,A.STWD_LNM AS STWD_LNM ,A.STWD_PNM AS STWD_PNM ,A.OBJ_DESCN ,A.RQST_USER_ID ,U.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM ,null as DATA_TYPE ,null as DATA_LEN ,null as DATA_SCAL ,null as DMN_LNM ,null as DMN_PNM FROM WAM_DB_STWD A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.RQST_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND U.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d')
AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
AND (A.STWD_LNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%') OR A.STWD_PNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%') OR A.STWD_LNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , UPPER(#{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , '%') OR A.STWD_PNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , UPPER(#{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , '%'))
AND A.OBJ_DESCN LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%')
AND 'STWD' = #{bizDtlCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY NO, STWD_LNM

SELECT A.STWD_ID ,A.STWD_LNM AS STWD_LNM ,A.STWD_PNM AS STWD_PNM ,'STWD' AS BIZ_DTL_CD ,A.REG_TYP_CD ,A.STR_DTM ,IFNULL(A.RQST_USER_ID, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID) AS FRS_RQST_USER_ID ,U.USER_NM AS FRS_RQST_USER_NM ,A.OBJ_DESCN FROM WAH_STWD A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON IFNULL(A.RQST_USER_ID, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID) = U.USER_ID AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND U.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d')
AND A.REG_TYP_CD LIKE CASE #{regTypCd} WHEN 'U' THEN 'U' WHEN 'C' THEN 'C' WHEN 'D' THEN 'D' WHEN 'ALL' THEN '%%' END
AND (A.STWD_LNM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%') OR A.STWD_PNM LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , '%'))
AND A.OBJ_DESCN LIKE CONCAT('%', #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%')
AND 'STWD' = #{bizDtlCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (DATE_FORMAT(A.STR_DTM , '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{searchBgnDe} AND #{searchEndDe})
UNION ALL SELECT A.DMN_ID AS STWD_ID ,A.DMN_LNM AS STWD_LNM ,A.DMN_PNM AS STWD_PNM ,'DMN' AS BIZ_DTL_CD ,A.REG_TYP_CD ,A.STR_DTM ,IFNULL(A.RQST_USER_ID, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID) AS FRS_RQST_USER_ID ,U.USER_NM AS FRS_RQST_USER_NM ,A.OBJ_DESCN FROM WAH_DMN A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON IFNULL(A.RQST_USER_ID, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID) = U.USER_ID AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND U.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d')
AND A.REG_TYP_CD LIKE CASE #{regTypCd} WHEN 'U' THEN 'U' WHEN 'C' THEN 'C' WHEN 'D' THEN 'D' WHEN 'ALL' THEN '%%' END
AND (A.DMN_LNM LIKE CONCAT( '%' , #{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') OR A.DMN_PNM LIKE CONCAT( '%' , UPPER(#{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%'))
AND A.OBJ_DESCN LIKE CONCAT( '%' , #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND 'DMN' = #{bizDtlCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (DATE_FORMAT(A.STR_DTM , '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{searchBgnDe} AND #{searchEndDe})
UNION ALL SELECT A.SDITM_ID AS STWD_ID ,A.SDITM_LNM AS STWD_LNM ,A.SDITM_PNM AS STWD_PNM ,'SDITM' AS BIZ_DTL_CD ,A.REG_TYP_CD ,A.STR_DTM ,IFNULL(A.RQST_USER_ID, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID) AS FRS_RQST_USER_ID ,U.USER_NM AS FRS_RQST_USER_NM ,A.OBJ_DESCN FROM WAH_SDITM A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON IFNULL(A.RQST_USER_ID, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID) = U.USER_ID AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND U.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d')
AND A.REG_TYP_CD LIKE CASE #{regTypCd} WHEN 'U' THEN 'U' WHEN 'C' THEN 'C' WHEN 'D' THEN 'D' WHEN 'ALL' THEN '%%' END
AND (A.SDITM_LNM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') OR A.SDITM_PNM LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%'))
AND A.OBJ_DESCN LIKE CONCAT('%', #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND 'SDITM' = #{bizDtlCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (DATE_FORMAT(A.STR_DTM , '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{searchBgnDe} AND #{searchEndDe})
ORDER BY 2,4
mapper.insert: insert into WAM_DB_STWD (STWD_ID, STWD_LNM, STWD_PNM, ENG_MEAN, RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, OWNR_ORG, SPCL_NT) values (#{stwdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stwdLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stwdPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{engMean,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownrOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spclNt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into WAM_DB_STWD
STWD_ID,
STWD_LNM,
STWD_PNM,
ENG_MEAN,
RQST_NO,
RQST_SNO,
OBJ_DESCN,
OBJ_VERS,
REG_TYP_CD,
FRS_RQST_DTM,
FRS_RQST_USER_ID,
RQST_DTM,
RQST_USER_ID,
APRV_DTM,
APRV_USER_ID,
DMN_YN,
DMN_LNM,
ORG_NM,
SYMN_LNM,
FBDN_LNM,
DB_NM,
OWNR_ORG,
SPCL_NT,
#{stwdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{stwdLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPPER(#{stwdPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),
#{engMean,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=DATE},
#{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rqstDtm,jdbcType=DATE},
#{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{aprvDtm,jdbcType=DATE},
#{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dmnYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orgNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{symnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fbdnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dbNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ownrOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{spclNt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update WAM_DB_STWD
STWD_LNM = #{stwdLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STWD_PNM = UPPER(#{stwdPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),
ENG_MEAN = #{engMean,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=DATE},
FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=DATE},
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=DATE},
APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DMN_YN= #{dmnYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DMN_LNM = #{dmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_NM = #{orgNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYMN_LNM = #{symnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FBDN_LNM = #{fbdnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DB_NM = #{dbNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OWNR_ORG = #{ownrOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SPCL_NT = #{spclNt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where STWD_ID = #{stwdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update WAM_DB_STWD set STWD_LNM = #{stwdLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STWD_PNM = UPPER(#{stwdPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), ENG_MEAN = #{engMean,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CCH_NM = #{cchNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_DS = #{orgDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMN_YN= #{dmnYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMN_LNM = #{dmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_NM = #{orgNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FBDN_LNM = #{fbdnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYMN_LNM = #{symnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DB_NM = #{dbNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OWNR_ORG = #{ownrOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPCL_NT = #{spclNt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where STWD_ID = #{stwdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into WAM_DB_STWD () select
from WAH_STWD where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '99991231', '%Y%m%d') and REG_TYP_CD in ('C','U')
mapper.select: SELECT A.* , (SELECT USER_NM FROM WAA_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.RQST_USER_ID and EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d')) AS RQST_USER_NM , CASE WHEN A.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') THEN '#0000FF' ELSE NULL END AS FontColor FROM WAH_STWD A WHERE STWD_ID = #{stwdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY EXP_DTM DESC, STR_DTM DESC

SELECT * FROM WAM_DB_STWD
(STWD_LNM = #{sbswdLnm} OR STWD_LNM = UPPER(#{sbswdLnm})) AND (STWD_PNM = #{sbswdPnm} OR STWD_PNM = UPPER(#{sbswdPnm})) AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
mapper.insert:
insert into WAM_DB_STWD ( STWD_ID, STWD_LNM, STWD_PNM, ENG_MEAN, RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, DMN_YN, DMN_LNM, ORG_NM, SYMN_LNM, FBDN_LNM, DB_NM, OWNR_ORG, SPCL_NT ) values
( concat('I_', db_serial.next_value), #{item.stwdLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.stwdPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.engMean,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, 'C', #{item.frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.rqstDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.aprvDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dmnYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.orgNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.symnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fbdnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dbNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ownrOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.spclNt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

update.foreach:
update WAM_DB_STWD set STWD_LNM = #{item.stwdLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STWD_PNM = #{item.stwdPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENG_MEAN = #{item.engMean,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_NO = #{item.rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_SNO = #{item.rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OBJ_DESCN = #{item.objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{item.objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_TYP_CD = #{item.regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRS_RQST_DTM = #{item.frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{item.frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DTM = #{item.rqstDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, RQST_USER_ID = #{item.rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APRV_DTM = #{item.aprvDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, APRV_USER_ID = #{item.aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMN_YN= #{item.dmnYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMN_LNM = #{item.dmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_NM = #{item.orgNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYMN_LNM = #{item.symnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FBDN_LNM = #{item.fbdnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DB_NM = #{item.dbNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OWNR_ORG = #{item.ownrOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONFIRM_DTM = SYSDATE, CONFIRM_YN = 'Y',
CONFIRM_YN = 'N', VALID_YN = 'N',
SPCL_NT = #{item.spclNt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ERR_CHK = '' where STWD_ID = #{item.stwdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT STWD_ID, DB_NM , ORG_NM, NVL(STWD_LNM ,'') AS STWD_LNM, NVL(STWD_PNM ,'') AS STWD_PNM, NVL(DMN_YN ,'') AS DMN_YN, TO_CHAR (RQST_DTM,'YYYYMMDD') AS STWD_DTM FROM WAM_DB_STWD WHERE (CONFIRM_YN = 'N' OR CONFIRM_YN = '' OR CONFIRM_YN IS NULL) AND (VALID_YN = 'N' OR VALID_YN = '' OR VALID_YN IS NULL) ORDER BY STWD_ID ASC ) T1 where ROWNUM <= 1000

SELECT count(*) FROM WAM_DB_STWD A WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.VALID_YN ='Y'
AND (A.VALID_YN IS NULL OR A.VALID_YN = '' OR A.VALID_YN = 'N')
AND A.VALID_YN ='E'
AND A.CONFIRM_YN ='Y'
AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
AND A.ORG_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orgNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND REPLACE(A.DB_NM, ' ', '') LIKE CONCAT('%',REPLACE(#{dbNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ' ', ''),'%')
AND REPLACE(A.DB_NM, ' ', '') IN (SELECT REPLACE(A.DB_NM, ' ', '') AS DB_NM FROM WAA_USER_DB WHERE USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND A.ORG_NM IN (SELECT ORG_NM FROM WAA_ORG WHERE ORG_CD IN (SELECT ORG_CD FROM WAA_USER_ORG WHERE USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}))
AND (A.STWD_LNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%') OR A.STWD_PNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%') OR A.STWD_LNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , UPPER(#{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , '%') OR A.STWD_PNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , UPPER(#{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , '%'))

SELECT ORG_NM --기관명 ,DB_NM --DB명 ,STWD_LNM --표준단어명 ,NVL(ENG_MEAN,'') AS ENG_MEAN --단어영문명 ,STWD_PNM --단어영문약어명 ,OBJ_DESCN --단어설명 ,DMN_YN --형식단어여부 ,NVL(DMN_LNM,'') AS DMN_LNM --도메인분류명 ,NVL(SYMN_LNM,'') AS SYMN_LNM --이음동의어목록 ,NVL(FBDN_LNM,'') AS FBDN_LNM --금칙어목록 ,NVL(OWNR_ORG,'') AS OWNR_ORG --관리부서명 ,RQST_DTM --제정일자 ,NVL(SPCL_NT,'') AS SPCL_NT --특이사항 ,NVL(ERR_CHK,'') AS ERR_CHK --검증메세지 FROM WAM_DB_STWD A WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.VALID_YN ='Y'
AND (A.VALID_YN IS NULL OR A.VALID_YN = '' OR A.VALID_YN = 'N')
AND A.VALID_YN ='E'
AND A.CONFIRM_YN ='Y'
AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
AND A.ORG_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orgNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND REPLACE(A.DB_NM, ' ', '') LIKE CONCAT('%',REPLACE(#{dbNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ' ', ''),'%')
AND REPLACE(A.DB_NM, ' ', '') IN (SELECT REPLACE(DB_NM, ' ', '') AS DB_NM FROM WAA_USER_DB WHERE USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND A.ORG_NM IN (SELECT ORG_NM FROM WAA_ORG WHERE ORG_CD IN (SELECT ORG_CD FROM WAA_USER_ORG WHERE USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}))
AND (A.STWD_LNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%') OR A.STWD_PNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%') OR A.STWD_LNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , UPPER(#{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , '%') OR A.STWD_PNM LIKE CONCAT('%' , UPPER(#{stndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , '%'))
ORDER BY RQST_DTM ASC,STWD_LNM ASC
